website_summaries.verdict: This supplement is designed to help prevent hair loss and improve your immune system at the same time.
pros: Blocks DHT, which is thought to cause hair loss
Improves digestion and prostate health with added probiotics
Improves the strength of your hair while giving you more energy
cons: When you stop taking the pill, it is possible that your hair will fall out again

customer_reviews.title: Worked for my Androgenic Alopecia
customer_reviews.text: OMG! I wanna cry! This thing works! I am a 35 yrs old Dermatology nurse, i’ve been suffering from Androgenic Alopecia since teenage years. I have tried EVERYTHING! Including PRP and expensive laser helmets. I wanted to give up and shave my head. Two weeks into taking these magic capsules and i’ve noticed ACTUAL HAIR GROWTH that even PRP could not do! WORTH. EVERY. PENNY. and i don’t write reviews very often. But i feel like i need to convince people who have been suffering as i have, to give this a shot! Stop wasting your money on other products! This is it ladies!
customer_reviews.author: John Linsangan

customer_reviews.title: “I have hypothyroidism and have been losing my hair for ...
customer_reviews.text: “I have hypothyroidism and have been losing my hair for a while now. This is the first product that I have bought that has restored some of my hair lose. I am a regular client of this product.”
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Starting 2nd Bottle/Month
customer_reviews.text: - No signs of hair fall - Strong and full erections due to the proper ingredient dose. - Very happy that the product has several DHT blocking ingredients in one pill. - I do not feel any depression symptoms sometimes associated with taking Saw Palmetto which I have experienced from other brands/doses. - Very happy with the product and company.
customer_reviews.author: ¡Chocinho!

customer_reviews.title: Nasty Side Effect
customer_reviews.text: Do not take this product! I am experiencing what they call the Post Finasteride Syndrome after taking it for 9 months. I am experiencing lower libido, testicular ache, anxiety, depression and memory/concentration problems even after I discontinued taking it. Your health is more important than your hair, it is not worth the risk!
customer_reviews.author: Luis Salinas

customer_reviews.title: Do it.
customer_reviews.text: My fiance started taking about 7 weeks ago. I have noticed that his hair seems a bit duller but no signs of new growth. He takes these and biotin daily as well as rosemary and other essential oils in his shampoo. He said that he has felt like he has had more energy since taking these and has noticed a difference at the gym as well.
customer_reviews.author: Candieda

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this item twice now and I love it. Never has anything grew my hair and nails faster. It is a bit expensive but well worth the money! I can't do without this item in my daily regimen!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: This is the one!
customer_reviews.text: I almost bought a cheaper one but ended up with this...my hair was falling out in clumps and thinning and breaking off. I have hashimotos thyroid issue. Been using this a month and a half and my hair no longer falls out and grows like crazy. It is down to my waist. Has never been this long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Advanced Trichology DHT Blocker does work
customer_reviews.text: It has been about 4 months and I have noticed dramatic reduction of hair fall and growth of new hairs. It was also noticed by some when they commented on my peach fuzz on my scalp. I intend to continue this. I am very particular about the quality of the product and the company / person behind it. I must say the product has excellent natural ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Amazing

customer_reviews.title: Helpful product
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be helping, have noticed quite a difference after 1 month using in conjunction with rogaine.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica H

customer_reviews.title: Noticed improvement
customer_reviews.text: I’ve seen improvement with less hair loss in the first month of use and so far am happy with this product! My hair loss is related to PCOS and has been an issue for years, once discovering androgenetic alopecia diagnosis a couple months ago I’ve focused treatment on DHT blocking supplements and am seeing improvement through this product. And customer service has been great!
customer_reviews.author: amazonqueen

customer_reviews.title: Works extremely well
customer_reviews.text: I've tried other solutions, like Propecia and Minoxidil, but this is the only product I've found that actually appears to be stopping hair loss and in a couple places, I can actually see new hair growth. I have taken photos before and after using the product for the past couple months, and I can see real results. I'm extremely happy.
customer_reviews.author: mchicago

customer_reviews.title: Will is a great dude
customer_reviews.text: If you live in socal swing by his office, you will learn a lot from just 1 visit. DHT blocker combined with a good diet seems to be doing good things so far.
customer_reviews.author: RJP

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: As so far, I'm happy with this product. I think this product work well. At least I can see I lose less hairs than before. It's been several months I'm using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Taeho Daniel Lee

customer_reviews.title: ITS WORKING!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Foligrowth and the DHT Blocker in conjunction with a Minoxidil 5% solution. AFTER ONLY 1 MONTH'S USE I HAVE NEW HAIR GROWTH IN PLACES I THOUGHT WOULD BE PERMANENTLY BALD. I have purchased another round of the products, and will post agin in another 30 days.
customer_reviews.author: Garratt

customer_reviews.title: Male crown thinning...Starting 3rd month...results are becoming obivious...I am encouraged for the first time in a long time!
customer_reviews.text: I take this DHT blocker with Foligrowth and can definitely say that my hair has got stronger. I have crown thinning but nothing is totally smooth and bald. This has given me a stronger hair shaft and I can see some new hairs slowly filling in. My first time I took just DHT blocker and then the second month I started both the blocker and foligrowth and I am now on my third month now. I occasionally use rogain foam but not regularly at all. I am considering trying the nutriviv once my rogain runs out. These vitamins actually work! I would recommend this to any man that is struggling with hair thinning.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Too Soon But Hopeful
customer_reviews.text: If the reviews are real then I expect this product to work just as well for me. It is too soon for me to give a completely positive review. I did register the product on the Advanced Trichology website and will receive one free product which is great marketing. I appreciate that...
customer_reviews.author: Amunet

customer_reviews.title: Did not work; has side effects.
customer_reviews.text: This had no effect on slowing hair loss for me whatsoever. The only notable effect was a lowered sex drive, which I would discover is one of the known side effects of some DHT blockers. Big bummer! Hoping to be refunded under their 120-day guarantee.
customer_reviews.author: Arrien Zinghini

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I am a decades long sufferer of hypothyroidism. It has taken a very long time to find something that would allow my hair to grow back in for my fingernails to look healthy again. This is it!
customer_reviews.author: TexasHeat

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: This product is fantastic. It has helped me so much. I also use their hair shake recipe that was generously included. I have been on the product for about 6 months and have seen a dramatic improvement in my health and hair. I highly recommend their products. The seller provides excellent service. If you have a question, they respond immediately. If you want to improve your health and have thicker fuller hair look no further then Advanced Technology. I also just started using the Foligrowth product. I will be back to let you know how it has also has helped me.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Landers

customer_reviews.title: Expensive
customer_reviews.text: Serving size is 4 pills a day, so this is basically a one month supply. Too early to tell if it will work and too expensive to take for long.
customer_reviews.author: wdchongjr

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!!! Dosen't Work.
customer_reviews.text: I really thought I had found the right vitiman for my hair that I've been soo desperately looking for!!!!! But to be honest my hair loss has gotten worse after I started taking this I didn't expect to see new hair right away but at least the shedding less.Cause even when I take regular Biotin my hair loss stops doesn't help me grow new hair but at least it stops and this product really sucks and I regret spending this much on this.
customer_reviews.author: Sanoj Dhamindranath

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product once a month for 4 months, with absolutely NO results! I Really wanted to believe it would make a difference, that’s why I stuck with it for that many purchases. I will not spend anymore on this product.
customer_reviews.author: susieq

customer_reviews.title: does NOT work
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Notrofol for months and started using this and now my hair is falling out... in clumps,.. I have never returned any supplement before or left a negative remarks, but this one made me angry for its deception.
customer_reviews.author: smiths

customer_reviews.title: had side effects
customer_reviews.text: I have had many side effects by taking this pills. Abdomen pain, testicular pain and constant fatigue which lasted for another 2 months. Stopped using it after 2 weeks after facing depression, thinning of hair and a few more which I don't want to mention here. It took me long to gather courage to write this review because of the shamefull side-effects I am facing. Please don't buy and @Amazon, please don't promote this product. It has serious side-effects. I wan't my money back.
customer_reviews.author: RA

customer_reviews.title: WARRANTY
customer_reviews.text: I USEDE 2 OF THIS PROUDCUT BUT UFOURTONETLY IT WASNT LIKE WEBSITE DECRIPTION AND BASE ON THAT DETAILS, I SUPPOSE TO GET MY MONEY BACK IF THE PROUDUCT DIDNT WORK. SO THESES PROSUCT DIDNT HELPED AT ALL AND I NEED MY MONEY BACK. THANKS
customer_reviews.author: janet

customer_reviews.title: Seeing Improvement
customer_reviews.text: I have only been using this product for about 6 weeks now, but I can see that I am not losing as much hair as before. I am excited about that result, however, it is a bit pricey to keep this up. There are others on the market that are far cheaper than this one, so I will most likely have to go to them. Also, the picture of the label on Amazon shows 15 billion active bacteria and the bottle that I got only says 10 billion, so I'm not sure how much is really in there?
customer_reviews.author: Team Family

customer_reviews.title: No side effects
customer_reviews.text: In all honesty, I can't really tell if this is working or not. I have androgenetic alopecia and experience periods of heavy shedding and at other times, I'll shed significantly less. However, I'd rather keep taking this than risk finding out it actually was working! There are no side effects, which is more than I could say for other brands. The only down side to this (other than cost) is that the coating on the pills can make them a little difficult to get down. I've been taking these for 3 months now, so if I notice any changes worth noting, I'll update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Steinbrueck

customer_reviews.title: Not sure it worked
customer_reviews.text: My hair has been thinning and falling out. It's upsetting and making me feel old. This product sounded amazing and gave me such high hopes. But after using it, I didn't feel it lived up to the description. My hair may have thickened slightly and there was a little bit of growth at the hairline. But not much more than usual. And my hair didn't feel any healthier. The product description promised so much, and it was expensive so I was hoping for it to really bring back fullness and luster. But I can't say it made much difference.
customer_reviews.author: Maryjane Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Ripoff
customer_reviews.text: This did not work for me at all. Instead my hair was thinning faster than, noticed huge thinning after 2 weeks and quit. I also noticed muscle spasms in my left ear drum, weird.
customer_reviews.author: leonard

customer_reviews.title: Not good unless you like abdominal pain
customer_reviews.text: I've only been taking them for a few days, we'll see how it goes. No side effects so far. Update: Not good, these caused bad abdominal pain , gas and testicle aches . I stopped taking them for a couple of days and the symptoms went away . I'm guessing the probiotics caused most of the problems.
customer_reviews.author: Eric T.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money for me
customer_reviews.text: So im not sure why everyone loves this product. Im on my 2nd bottle so far no good changes only shedding like a dog 😭 going to look for something else since 100$ a month is not enough to help your hair. I also purchased the foligrowth vitamins - it doesn’t work. I would think in 2 month i would see something- but no
customer_reviews.author: Natalia V

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for about two weeks and have already seen a difference in hair shedding. My DHT levels were high on a recent evaluation, so I knew I needed to find something that would block that... without going on medication if at all possible. I tried a shampoo/conditioner for about a month prior to finding this (didn't want systemic products if I didn't have to go that route) and while it helped a little, it didn't provide significant reduction in hair loss. I will be buying another bottle and give it a few months to see if I get any regrowth.
customer_reviews.author: Anne H

customer_reviews.title: Hopeful
customer_reviews.text: I'm just getting started with the blockers. I'm very hopeful that they will work. At least the hair stopped falling and some very soft hair is back. But is too early to tell. I've seen some results from other people and that motivated me to try it. I have taken dht blockers in the past; a different brand. And side effects were horrible and that forced me to stop taking them. With this product, no issues at all! I'm very hopeful.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Hair Again
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! If you use it as instructed, your hair will fill back in and start to grow and get beautiful again. Just keep it up with consistentcy because if you quit them, your hair will start to fall back out and stop growing again. But, if you take them all the time, you will see what a miracle product this really is.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Jane Newlan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results for hair loss
customer_reviews.text: I used the product for my hair loss and made a big difference on my hair treatment. I have alopecia and this hair loss lasted for about 3 months. After I started taking this product my hair stopped falling out and new hairs started to grow. I strongly believe that Advanced Trichology DHT Blocker helped me with my hair loss and for me it is totally worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: susana

customer_reviews.title: Almost No Hair Fallout Now...
customer_reviews.text: I am presently on my second bottle of the Advanced Trichology DHT Blocker and have already noticed a significant drop in how much hair I lose both during the day and in the shower. The amount of fallout has gone from quite a lot to just a few strands, which is pretty amazing. I do not expect to see growth for at least another month or two as it takes time for hair to resolve, but the fact I'm not losing a ton of hair is very promising. I plan to continue using this product for at least 6 months and then re-review again in order to provide a better overall review of its efficacy. Looking forward to sharing more...
customer_reviews.author: Angelica G

customer_reviews.title: It actually works!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this product since February (6 months) and am seeing new hair growth for the first time in years!! I have been having hair loss for @6 years now since starting hormonal replacement therapy for menopause. Dr.'s have not been able to figure out why I'm losing hair, (they thought hormones should be helping me) so I (in desperation) did my own research and found this product on Amazon, and BOOM! It's actually working for me!! I am super excited and going to try some of their other products (shampoo and nutritional support) and see if I can finally fix this elusive issue!
customer_reviews.author: nana1016

customer_reviews.title: Something seems off with this product
customer_reviews.text: Don’t know what is really in this stuff but 10 days into consistently taking the product I broke out in patches of eczema all over my torso, arms, and neck. I have never had eczema until using this product and when I stopped using it the red, angry patches went away. The FDA doesn’t regulate these kinds of products (label says “made in the USA”- I’m skeptical) so I suppose it was a gamble that shouldn’t have been such a surprise but I’ve taken numerous supplements and prescriptions before without any adverse reactions. My gut says something isn’t right about this product’s ingredient sourcing.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: One Bottle is ONE Month
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had known from the beginning that one bottle is only good for one month and you need 3-4 months so 3-4 bottles to tell if anything is happening. So just know you're in not for $45 but for $150-200 to see if it works. I'm giving it one star for now and will review again after I've used it for 30 days, but likely nothing happens in 30 days and you really need 3-4 months to see any progress. They should just sell the 4 month supply from the beginning then. I'll increase the stars if it actually works but $45 a month for life is not going to be feasible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't work for me.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't been using this product long enough to tell if it works. I don't like the taste that I keep burping up. I will follow up when I see results. UPDATE: I've gone through 2 bottles now and have seen no results. I'm 58 and have thinning at the front and crown of my head. I got better results from Rogaine for women. I'll go back to that, this product is junk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big, hard to swallow. Results pending.
customer_reviews.text: I'm about 3 weeks in. Still haven't seen any changes in hair loss or hair growth, however it does say on the box to use for 3-4 months before results can be seen. I don't know if that's just a way to get you to buy more or if that's really true. I will update if I see any changes in 3 months. Full disclosure, I'm writing this review so I can get the 60% off coupon. But they didn't say it had to be a positive review.
customer_reviews.author: Andy S.

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Had more than 6 bottles, consistency with taking them and results were not showing. To make this testing fair, you have to have the same hair length for a very long time and compare. Thickness of my hair, nail were the same. I don’t think it’s worth buying and don’t tell yourself that your seeing results by growing your hair and covering it. It’s Not worth $45 in my opinion.....
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Great Immune Support
customer_reviews.text: I am nearing my 30 days with this product. One thing I noticed after a few days of taking it, is the immune support I've been having. I have noticed a positive difference in how I've felt with my digestibility since I am very sensitive to foods. In terms of my hair, I haven't noticed too much as of yet with the thickening but my hair has definitely grown an inch since first taking it. I will continue the trial and update my review if there is any difference.
customer_reviews.author: AeBlaza

customer_reviews.title: Supporting company that cares
customer_reviews.text: I ordered DHT blocker when I began loosing hair rapidly. I had a friend that was wearing a wig until she started this product, along with other supplements from Advanced Trichology. I am impressed that you can email the company for assistance to help select the best product. I have just begun but I am feeling hope now; I had stopped going places because I didn’t want to wash and dry my hair too often.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa C

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Does not work, contacted the company for the 90 days warranty, no response. Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Dnada

customer_reviews.title: Hopeful (and will update)
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was very quick. I appreciated the opportunity for free product (a second bottle will be free), and a discounted product (for a third bottle) for a review. This generous offer will enable me to experience a full 90-days of product use. I plan on updating my review at 30 days, 60 days and 90 days. Based on the ingredients, I am very hopeful of successful hair regrowth. My hair loss is throughout my scalp, with a higher degree of loss at the crown and the temples.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Three

customer_reviews.title: Thin Hair is Thickening and New Growth of Hair on the Bald Spot
customer_reviews.text: I have used the product for about 3 months, I have noticed the improvement and thickness of my hair. Before using the product my hair appear thin with little luster or thickness. I am also using the hair serum and the FolliGrowth Hair Growth and Nutraviv Scalp Serum, I have noticed drastic change in the appearance and thickness of my hair. Wil continue to use to see growth, thickness, and overall improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Visible hair growth and fullness in the first month!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product along with another product from the company, and biotin shampoo. We have used it for only a month so this far and I'm ever the skeptic but I believe in trying everything once or twice. My husband's hair appears to be growing in thicker and we're hopeful that it fills in a lot more in the coming month or two! I will update in the near future hopefully, with another star and photo! We are very happy this far with his results and he definitely feels younger, more attractive and has more pep in his step!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea G.

customer_reviews.title: Pills are huge
customer_reviews.text: Pills are huge. I switched to this product after being on another for 6 months with great results and wanted to try something else. Started seeing the same amount of sheding I had before I started taking my first supplement, switched back before this bottle was even finished.
customer_reviews.author: Crissy

customer_reviews.title: Stopped shedding & root sensitivity
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I both have been using this for about 4 mos, but he more consistently than myself. He did notice the root of his hairs felt more secure, and when I’m not taking it my root doesn’t feel secure, it’s more sensitive, and hair rips out more easily. I’m unsure if his hair is thickening up yet? But, I can say his shedding definitely has ceased! We were also taking the Foligrowth but stopped because we already taking those ingredients in our multi-vitamin. But, we liked the Foligrowth. I’m allergic to bovine capsules so I’m happy that this brand uses Vegetable Capsules!!!! Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I actually didn't think this would work, as I have tried so many things already (including years of Minoxidil). But I was wrong. This DHT Blocker is working on me, so much so that I have come back after about 45 days to reorder. And this time I will combine it with Foligrowth and Nutraviv. Guys!! Give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Bolivar

customer_reviews.title: CAUSES ED
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy! All my years on Amazon and I’ve never written a review for a product, but this needs to be said. The other reviews have to be paid off. I’m not sure what the issue was with these pills, but they caused major ED when usually I have the labido of a rabbit. I opted for something else with palmetto and the issue resolved after 2 weeks of non-use. If you are taking these and having the same issue stop taking immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy Roberts

customer_reviews.title: My hair WILL NOT grow, but maybe I’m getting some results?
customer_reviews.text: So I’ve only used these for about two weeks and surprisingly I’ve noticed a tiny bit of hair growth. My hair hasn’t grown in about five years, and no matter what I try (moisturizer, hair growth pills, ect) it’s really weird. I remembered a year ago when I got my hormones checked that I was “testosterone normal-High” (I’m 23 female) and so I looked into DHT blockers because perhaps my higher than normal test was stopping my hair from growing.. either way I plan on keeping going with these pills for about three months to see if I see some massive changes. Hoping for the best.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Enfield

customer_reviews.title: worked for me!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to leave my review on my first purchase..About a year ago I noticed my hair coming out when I was washing it. More hair than normal was falling when I brushed it. I saw some result within 6 weeks of starting DHT Blocker. At the 3 month mark I was not losing any hair when washing. I could tell by looking at my scalp that it was visibly better. I stopped using and a month later my hair was falling out again. I am getting back on the DHT Blocker.
customer_reviews.author: holly0107

customer_reviews.title: good overall
customer_reviews.text: I like these pills, I have seen difference in my hair. I see new hair coming out and my nails are stronger too. but there are a few reasons I didn't give 5 stars: 1. they are gentle to the stomach but to me, it gives the blooming feeling and gas. 2. I can't sleep if I take the 2 pills at night. I'm not sure which is the ingredient probably B12. So right now I'm stuck with 2 in the morning and the effect are not as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: ogerta

customer_reviews.title: Getting results
customer_reviews.text: I am noticing some increased thickness. I have been using DHT blocker for 2 months now. This along with Cologen and biotin but maybe most importantly for me ,distilled water for shampoo and conditioner. The water here is very alkaline i I really didn't experience very much thinning till we moved to San Felipe ,Mx. a couple years ago. I think the combination of these products and a 10 minute daily scalp massage is working for me. Someone even positively commented on my hair just yesterday. Worth the price if I keep getting improving results.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Stronger, healthier hair for sure..
customer_reviews.text: the product listed above, along with Advanced Tricology’s Foligrowth has absolutely 360’ed the texture and strength of my hair within the first half bottle used. There’s no telling the scale of how each of them are effective on they’re own as I have I lay taken them both together as recommended by numerous viewers. It’s expensive if purchasing both at full price, but based off of the current results, it’s worth the risk if not for a couple more months.. and who knows? If the results are satisfactory, I may just have to continue with the product until it plateaus. Unless, the formula proves me completely wrong. More updates to come.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Think im seeing results
customer_reviews.text: I think im seeing good results. Seems like less hair falling out and my mohawk style hair doesnt seem so thin in the front... I am going to confirm after the bottle is empty and will give an honest review .. I will order again.. if this is legit...
customer_reviews.author: Josiah J.

customer_reviews.title: I can attest that it works
customer_reviews.text: I started losing lots of hair due to hormonal changes and stress. I ordered my first bottle and started to some short baby hairs growing in the sparse areas of my scalp within four weeks. I moved onto to a second bottle thereafter and noticed that there were less strands of hair in my drain catcher in the bathtub. I am excited about this product and have moved onto bottle # 3.
customer_reviews.author: Liz T.

customer_reviews.title: It's been one month.  No results yet
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 bottles so it can last me 2 months and I can attempt to gauge possible results. I'm nearly finished with the first bottle and don't see any reduction in shedding in the shower or new growth. Will update this review when nearly complete with the 2nd bottle. I've been taking 2 pills with lunch and 2 pills with dinner. FYI, I've had hairloss since puberty.
customer_reviews.author: Sofia K

customer_reviews.title: After 45 days...
customer_reviews.text: While swallowing the pills is unpleasant due to their "floaty" nature, the product [being used in combination with a shampoo containing a diff't DHT blocker] seems to have slowed hair shedding by 95%. What I dislike about the pills is how much they float in water.... Trying to swallow the things often takes 6oz of water just to get the things to go down. Taking it mid-meal effectively takes care of the issue, but I find that sometimes I get sick to my stomach when taking the stuff less than 30 mins. after eating certain foods.
customer_reviews.author: Fizgig

customer_reviews.title: We'll see how is goes. 3 months in and no real change yet
customer_reviews.text: A little Expensive, but what related to hariloss prevention isn't these days? 3 months in and No Change yet... I'm also using this with other methods (ie. Minoxil,DHT blocking and Ketoconazole shampo, Microneedling, Copper Peptides,Laser Helmet....etc etc) I might just be out of luck here on the whole "Hair Loss" front....but I'll update ya on my progress.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Stiles

customer_reviews.title: Stick with it, it works
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product before and it does help. It has all the natural ingredient needed to stimulate hair follicles and retard hair loss severely. The only Con is the price point. They need to figure out a way to reduce cost so they can pass the savings to the customers.
customer_reviews.author: steven juste

customer_reviews.title: This is my second review for the great DHT Blocker
customer_reviews.text: I took one bottle of Advanced Trichology's DHT Blocker early this year and saw good results. After the first bottle I switched to another brand as Advanced Trichology is a bit pricy. However the results were not satisfactory, hence two months back I switched to AT's DHT Blocker again. I am on my second bottle, I saw results after finishing the first bottle, my severe hair fall problem reduced and I see new hair growth.
customer_reviews.author: NYC

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I was using it as a way to try and prevent conversion of testosterone into DHT to try to maximize my testosterone levels, as well as reduce the possibility of my hair thinning. I was taking it along with about a dozen other suppliments, so it's a little hard to comment on the effects of this product alone, however the combination of suppliments I was taking along with this one seemed quite effective in accomplishing my goals.
customer_reviews.author: Lindley

customer_reviews.title: They REALLY Work!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because I lost a bunch of hair about 4 months into my Keto diet. I lost a lot of weight and was happy about that, but this hair loss was something I was NOT happy about. I started taking the DHT Blocker and noticed re-growth within a week. I later ordered the NutraViv Hair Growth Serum and had results right away, especially around my hairline which was thinning due to age. I will ALWAYS keep these products on hand for use in my hair growth journey.
customer_reviews.author: Cash

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the hefty price tag
customer_reviews.text: These pills didn't work for me. I got roots really quick which means it grew fast, but the density didn't change and nothing grew back in. I get equal results with biotin and it's much cheaper. Won't be wasting my money by buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: Can tell it works
customer_reviews.text: I really feel that this was helping with my hair loss. Whenever I would remember to take it both times day, I noticed that I didnt lose as much hair in the shower or when I brush it. I would recommend this product for anyone who is experiencing hair loss/thinning and their doctor suggests to take a DHT blocker. My only issue with continuing this particular one is the cost. I'm disabled and on a limited income with other medications and supplements to have to get every month. Otherwise I think that this one ma be the better choice
customer_reviews.author: 3NC

customer_reviews.title: Stress literally makes my hair fall out like crazy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am learning a lot about how stress affects my body, and this DHT blocker is helping with my hair fall substancially! I have doubled this up with the foligrowth and I cannot be more satisfied! This was a great find and I totally vouch for the results im getting as I only have a few months till my wedding! I won't need those expensive extensions after all :)
customer_reviews.author: Karen Marie Dirks

customer_reviews.title: I'm Excited!
customer_reviews.text: I am very excited to try this product! Based on the ingredients, it seems like my results cannot be anything less than positive. I am on day 2!
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Hair is growing!
customer_reviews.text: I was losing my hair from the front and had a couple of bald patches. I read that a DHT blocker might help. I have used two bottles of this product and my two bald patches are filling in with hair. I am very pleased with this product and plan to continue to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Littlejohn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product, i started using it recently and have noticed an increase in the thickness of my hair. It is easy to swallow and it doesn't upset your stomach.
customer_reviews.author: D.R.C.

customer_reviews.title: Be Sure To Refrigerate
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you refrigerate after opening. You'll need to take a lot of these, so the bottles don't last long. Don't know how much the DHT blockers work, but my immune system seems to be pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars... so far!
customer_reviews.text: Does this help re-grow hair? Too soon to tell. Does this block DHT? Definitely. Much better than Saw Palmetto tabs which I have been taking for BHP for year. I notice a significant improvement in this area, so something is working.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff in Texas

customer_reviews.title: 30 day update
customer_reviews.text: I just recieved my bottles of Foligrowth and DHT blocker...Ive been taking then for two days now and so far no side effects. I'm hoping this product will help me. Current Pictures will be my before pictures as of 5/14/2020, will update in 60 days. 6/20/20 30 days update I know I said...I would update in 60 days but the amount of growth in just the first 30 days I had to share...Im so glad I've found this product...
customer_reviews.author: Kolehearted

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I've noticed my hair is fuller, much less fall out!!! This has been the proof in the pudding. I can brush my hair and not have to pull off tons of hair from brush. I also know it's working because I need to pluck my eyebrows more often. This is a funny side effect that I don't mind. I prefer this brand over another I am using. The other brand's pills not as easy to swallow. They offer a free bottle which is awesome. It does take a little work on your part to register. And then you can also qualify for more discounts.
customer_reviews.author: Marianna

customer_reviews.title: Love the ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I love that this product does not have a large (or any) amount of Vitamin A. My DHT was off the chart so my Dr. told me to use another brand that was super high in Vitamin A. Then I found this brand which better serves my needs. I take 2 every morning and my hair has been shedding a lot less. Can't wait to see my next labs.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly L. Pirtle

customer_reviews.title: Only time tells
customer_reviews.text: I have just recently started this. I too like many women have experienced sudden hair loss. It started at 46,multiple tests etc. When one goes their whole life with no shedding, no hair in brush it's kinda scary! Not that I don't have any hair but I'm hoping this product will stop the shedding and help with regrowth. I will post again in about a month. I started with 2 a day then will increase as to not upset the stomach
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My results...
customer_reviews.text: I just bought these so I'll update in a couple of months with pictures if this works for me or not. I have PCOS and androgenic alopecia which has caused my hair to thin all over, especially in my crown and the sides. Here's some positives I've noticed so far: The packaging is really nice, the pills don't have a super weird smell which is a plus, and the customer service has been excellent so far. The product arrived on schedule and it has a lot of good information on the packaging about what ingredients are inside the bottle and how that helps regrow your hair. I'll update this review in a few months but so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely did not work for me.
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking this DHT blocker for 5 months and there has been no improvement at all. In fact I feel I've experienced greater hair loss. For me it was a LOT of money spent for nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Delynn

customer_reviews.title: I've been taking these for a month and I notice no difference
customer_reviews.text: I have think hair and I wanted more of it. I don't have thinning hair, I'm not balding. This product does not work if you just want thicker hair. It's expensive and did nothing. Maybe it works for people who are actually balding but it does not work for women who just want thicker hair.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Dramatically decreased shedding in 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been taking this DHT Blocker supplement (along with the same company’s FoliGROWTH and EFA Complete supplements) for two weeks. I was shedding about 50 hairs a day for two months straight. Shedding has gone down to 5 hairs a day after taking these 3 supplements for the last 2 weeks. I plan on reordering the product. :)
customer_reviews.author: chow2006

customer_reviews.title: Even more effective minoxidil
customer_reviews.text: While I was deployed to Afghanistan, I started to notice large amounts of hair falling out of my scalp. The thinnin/hairloss went of for a year and a half, slowly. After getting out of the Army and adding this product to my hair loss treatment twice a day, I started noticing regrowth in the noticeable areas after about 4 months. I am still undergoing treatment and could not be happier about the results from this product. It takes time as you are messing with your hormones and chemicals in your body. So be patient and consistent.
customer_reviews.author: joshua boucher

customer_reviews.title: This company sponsors people to write reviews
customer_reviews.text: Just so you're aware, this company has a system in place to accumulate reviews artificially. The product is decent.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Too soon to tell
customer_reviews.text: I have been on this a month now, and I feel my hair may be getting a little thicker, but I'm not sure yet. I'm going to stay the course for the full 90 days, as that is what the reviewers, seller recommends. I will revise my review at that time. Fingers crossed!
customer_reviews.author: C. Rivers

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Started getting some kind of allergic reaction right away. Also its not good for your sexual hormones. It can give you major damage in future.
customer_reviews.author: Rohan M.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: Really appreciate the free bottle but I have not seen any difference in my hair loss. Has not helped.
customer_reviews.author: KRISTINE M

customer_reviews.title: Don’t purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t list side effects. I’ve only been taking the product for a week and have noticed a huge decrease in sex drive and sperm count, hopefully discontinuing the product will bring everything back to normal.
customer_reviews.author: julien hill

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work and no free bottle as promised in ad.
customer_reviews.text: Did not work and never received a free bottle as promised.
customer_reviews.author: B Miller

customer_reviews.title: Finished 1 bottle so far
customer_reviews.text: I ordered DHT Blocker and Foligrowth together. I followed the instructions and took the recommended amount morning and night. While my hair loss seemed to slow down, according to the hairs falling when I comb it, my thinning hair has seemed to still show my scalp. I ordered a 2nd bottle of each, as it might take more time.
customer_reviews.author: Winston

customer_reviews.title: just arrived will update later
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived, easy to swallow though. Will update later. However they offer a free bottle after you register and then 60% off another bottle. Hopefully this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This Really Works!
customer_reviews.text: After using DHT Blocker, I noticed that that I finally stopped finding large clumps of my hair in the drain after taking a shower. I was losing hair like crazy, but this product has really been of great help in decreasing my hair loss. This product actually does what it promises to do! I’ll definitely be placing another order for more. I would definitely give this a try if you’re losing clumps of your hair. I also use Nizoral shampoo, as there’s a chemical in it that stops hair loss. Hope this was of help.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Mack

customer_reviews.title: Seeing some success! Willing to wait for more!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product (3 bottles now) and have noticed a little less hair clogging my drain now when I shower. I think I need to use the product a little longer...these things take time...no overnight success stories with hair products! So far...so good. I will update my review in 3 months from now, some time in August 2020.
customer_reviews.author: thebonz0

customer_reviews.title: This product works!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product along with the FoliGrowth because I had noticed a significant amount of hair falling out with each shower. After taking these two supplements together, I have noticed that I am not losing nearly as much hair as I was previously. It also started working within a couple weeks which was exciting. My only caution is to take these supplements with food as it did upset my stomach.
customer_reviews.author: Julie klinger

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY HAVE HOPE!
customer_reviews.text: I have been suffering menopausal hair loss for 5 years. I have tried many different supplements but my hair loss has accelerated to an alarming degree. So far I have been on DHT Blocker for about one week along with the melatonin serum. There seems to be slightly less hair loss (both on my clothes and after washing.) Customer service has been EXCELLENT! I highly recommend getting the 15 minute hair consultation. MJ helped me more in 15 minutes than my doctor has in 5 years! Finally some hope..
customer_reviews.author: SUSAN ONTKO

customer_reviews.title: Best dht blocker
customer_reviews.text: This is my third bottle and I started to see my hair growing in the area where it was thinning. Top quality ingredients to block DHT. Would recommend to anyone who’s hair is thinning.
customer_reviews.author: Asibul hoque

customer_reviews.title: The best ingredients for hair loss in one supplement
customer_reviews.text: Prior to using Advanced Trichology DHT Blocker, I tried Nutrafol for 3 months with limited success. Now that Nutrafol charges $88.00 for a one month supply, I decided to try DHT Blocker to see what that could do for me (at half the price) This product contains all the ingredients I've researched to be effective against hair loss in one bottle.
customer_reviews.author: The Critic

customer_reviews.title: Yes it works
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the DHT blocker for a couple of weeks now, and the shedding that I had prior to taking this supplement has completely stopped. I actually noticed a decease in shedding after the first day or two. This product is backed with a 90 day money back guarantee, so there's nothing to loose except more hair if you don't try it. I am actually going to use this product in conjunction with the FoliGrowth hair vitamins for even greater results!
customer_reviews.author: TMichelle

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Decided to try attacking hair loss at the source. My hair is no longer falling out in the shower and I have a ton of new growth. Awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Angelpuppies3

customer_reviews.title: Sever abdominal and testicular
customer_reviews.text: Buy at your own risk. My first review on amazon, I've been taking this for a week now, this has caused me severe abdominal and testicular pain. I thought of reaching out to a Urologist until I saw 3 other reviewers having the same issue. Would like to have my refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

STOP HAIR LOSS AND NOTICE THE DIFFERENCE: The Advanced Trichology line was developed in our own top rated hair loss treatment centers. Our hair loss supplements have been scientifically tested in our clinics on thousands of male and female hair loss clients with Amazing Success.
MADE IN USA, QUALITY AND CERTIFIED PURE in Independent Testing. cGMP. Free of Gluten, Free of Wheat, and Vegetarian.

100% MONEYBACK GUARANTEE from 120 days of purchase. We want you to try and love our product Risk Free! If you do not love the DHT Blocker, send it back, and we will refund every penny of your purchase price. #1 Top Product for DHT Blockers by Trichology dot com 2019
